goal.ch: “This course aims at encouraging students to attend as many colloquium talks at the IAMS as possible. The students will gain the up-to-date and breadth of knowledge about contemporary molecular science and technology, as well as being exposed to the excitement and passion toward frontier research, through attending the invited talks delivered by the experts from diverse subfields.“

gradMethod.ch:
“The first-year-student needs to submit a written report on one of the colloquia. It accounts for 100％.
The second-year-student, including the 2nd year PhD student and the first-year-student of Direct Pursuit of PhD, needs to submit a written report on one of the colloquia and give an oral presentation on a recently published journal article. Each item accounts for 50％.
The third-year-student and beyond needs to give an 30-min oral presentation on a recently published journal article. Each item accounts for 100％.“
